tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
stu_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: While this class was pretty difficult, Dr. Locklin is great professor. His tests were difficult but manageable, as long as you know how to do the homeworks and old exams well. In the end he will give you the grade you\'ve earned.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Locklin is the best organic professor I\'ve had. Any OChem class would be hard, but his lectures were superb and he made sure to make sure everyone understood the material. Tests were VERY difficult, but he did recognize that - there was a sizeable curve at the end. Would definitely recommend.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: He is a great professor! This is organic chemistry so obviously it\'s a very hard class but he is the teacher to take. He cares how his students do and his notes are clear and easy to understand. Definitely go to class because his lectures help a lot! GREAT professor!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Awesome professor and very good at explaining the concepts. The tests are ridiculous though. Go to his office hours even though his office is far away as he gives great one on one help.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: He is a good teacher, but the tests are ridiculous. Even if you read the text book and do every problem, the problems on the test are much harder. This class requires about 1-2 hours of studying a night to make a good grade.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: he gives you all the information for the test before you take the test... other than Morrison who waits until the day of the test to give you the information... Morrison explains the material better but overall, i think Locklin is more helpful because he really goes out of his way to help students understand the material and pass the tests

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: He really went out of his way for the students. this class is very tough, but he is the best professor to take.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: This class is INCREDIBLY hard. He will help the best he can but mine was 300+ students and the class moves very quickly. I thought I knew material until I got to the tests, which almost always came back lower than I expected and hoped for. He doesn\'t use the book in class, but you definitely need it, because it helps tremendously. STUDY STUDY STUDY
